ERP Log Level

Customer Email

Short Message

IpAddress

Page URL

Erp Log Level represents the log elements type
Erp Sync Label represents the log entity/module type
Created On represents the generation date of the log.
Customer Email represents the Nop Customers email address.
Customer represents the Nop customer who does the activity.
Short Message represents the information in short.
Full Message represents the exception details if any issue occures.
Page URL represents the requested page, ehere the activity was happening.
Referrer URL represents the requested page, ehere the activity was happening.
